identification.description: Specifies the form of the restructuring credit event that is applicable to            the credit default swap.

codes.description: Restructuring (Section 4.7) and Modified Restructuring Maturity                    Limitation and Conditionally Transferable Obligation (2014 Definitions: Section                    3.31, 2003 Definitions: 2.32) apply.

Restructuring (Section 4.7) and Restructuring Maturity Limitation and                    Fully Transferable Obligation (2014 Definitions: Section 3.31, 2003 Definitions:                    2.32) apply.
Restructuring as defined in the applicable ISDA Credit Derivatives                    Definitions. (2003 or 2014).
